entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
